00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : FinalDump
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00019

00034 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00035 
00036  SUBROUTINE FinalDump
00037 
00038 !  Common Variables
00039  USE NTypes, ONLY : DBL
00040  USE Domain
00041  USE FluidParams
00042  IMPLICIT NONE
00043 
00044 !  Local Variables
00045  INTEGER :: i, j, nodesIn, nodesOut
00046  INTEGER :: IO_ERR
00047  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: Pin, Pout, Ro, R, Pdif, Perr, Uloc, Umax, Ref, Vef, Vol
00048  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: distroMem, auxMem, totalMem, memUnitF, memUnitG
00049 
00050 ! Initialize
00051  Pin  =  0.D0
00052  Pout =  0.D0
00053  Vol  =  0.D0
00054  Umax = -1.D0
00055  nodesIn  = 0
00056  nodesOut = 0
00057  Ro = bubbles(1,3)
00058 
00059 ! Pressure inside and outside the bubble, maximum velocity and effective radius
00060  DO j = ymin_f, ymax_f
00061    DO i = xmin_f, xmax_f
00062 
00063      R =  DSQRT( ( DBLE(i)-bubbles(1,1) )**2 + ( DBLE(j)-bubbles(1,2) )**2 )
00064      IF ( R < (Ro - IntWidth) ) THEN
00065        Pin = Pin + p_f(i,j)
00066        nodesIn = nodesIn + 1
00067      ELSE IF ( R > (Ro + IntWidth) ) THEN
00068        Pout = Pout + p_f(i,j)
00069        nodesOut = nodesOut + 1
00070      END IF
00071 
00072      Uloc = DSQRT( u_f(i,j,1)*u_f(i,j,1) + u_f(i,j,2)*u_f(i,j,2) )
00073      IF ( Uloc > Umax ) Umax = Uloc
00074      IF ( phi_f(i,j) >= 0.D0 ) Vol = Vol + 1.D0
00075 
00076    END DO
00077  END DO
00078 
00079 ! Calculate compliance with Laplace Law
00080  Pin  = Pin/DBLE(nodesIn)
00081  Pout = Pout/DBLE(nodesOut)
00082  Pdif = Pin - Pout
00083  Perr = (sigma/Ro - Pdif)*Ro/sigma
00084 
00085 ! Calculate phase conservation
00086  Ref = DSQRT( Vol*invPi )
00087  Vef = Vol*invInitVol
00088 
00089 ! Estimate memory usage (Mb)
00090  memUnitG = NX*NY/( 1024.D0*1024.D0 )
00091  memUnitF = NX_f*NY_f/( 1024.D0*1024.D0 )
00092  distroMem = 8.D0*( 18.D0*memUnitG + 10.D0*memUnitF )
00093  auxMem    = 8.D0*( 3.D0*( memUnitG + memUnitF ) + 4.D0*memUnitF ) &
00094            + 4.D0*( 4.D0*( memUnitG + memUnitF ) )
00095  totalMem  = distroMem + auxMem
00096 
00097 ! The effective radius, sigma and IntWidth are re-scaled to the momentum grid
00098  OPEN(UNIT = 10, FILE = "final.out", STATUS = "NEW", POSITION = "APPEND", &
00099       IOSTAT = IO_ERR)
00100  IF ( IO_ERR == 0 ) THEN
00101    WRITE(10,'(A)')'*** Multiphase Zheng-Shu-Chew LBM 2D Simulation ***'
00102    WRITE(10,'(A)')'*** Dual Grid Implementation (Serial)           ***'
00103    WRITE(10,*)
00104    WRITE(10,'(A)')'INPUT PARAMETERS'
00105    WRITE(10,'(A,I9)')'Total Iterations      = ',MaxStep+1
00106    WRITE(10,'(A,I9)')'Relaxation Iterations = ',RelaxStep+1
00107    WRITE(10,'(A,I9)')'Length in X Direction = ',xmax
00108    WRITE(10,'(A,I9)')'Length in Y Direction = ',ymax
00109    WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'Interface Width   = ',0.5D0*IntWidth
00110    WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'Interface Tension = ',0.5D0*sigma
00111    WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'Interface Mobility= ',Gamma
00112    WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'RhoL    = ',rhoL
00113    WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'RhoH    = ',rhoH
00114    WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'TauRho  = ',tauRho
00115    WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'TauPhi  = ',tauPhi
00116    WRITE(10,*)
00117    WRITE(10,'(A)')'MEMORY USAGE (Mb)'
00118    WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'Distributions     = ',distroMem
00119    WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'Auxiliary Arrays  = ',auxMem
00120    WRITE(10,'(A,ES15.5)')'Total Memory Used = ',totalMem
00121    WRITE(10,*)
00122    WRITE(10,'(A)')'OUTPUT RESULTS (RELAXATION)'
00123    WRITE(10,'(A,ES19.9)')'Effective Radius   = ',0.5D0*Ref
00124    WRITE(10,'(A,ES19.9)')'Phase Conservation = ',Vef
00125    WRITE(10,'(A,ES19.9)')'(Pin - Pout)       = ',Pdif
00126    WRITE(10,'(A,ES19.9)')'Laplace Error      = ',Perr
00127    WRITE(10,'(A,ES19.9)')'Parasitic Velocity = ',Umax
00128    WRITE(10,*)
00129    WRITE(10,'(A)')'***       Simulation Finished Succesfully       ***'
00130    CLOSE(UNIT = 10)
00131  ELSE
00132    CALL MemAlloc(2)
00133    STOP "Error: unable to open output file 'final.out'."
00134  END IF
00135 
00136  RETURN
00137  END SUBROUTINE FinalDump
Generated on Mon Nov 10 16:42:52 2008 for ZSC-2D-DGR by  1.5.6
